EventDetailLayout.help: Fields that are on this layout will be available to be selected below. This layout will also be used to display the event when double clicking on an event.
EventDetailLayout.label: Event Detail Layout

DefaultEventStyle.help: Choose the default style for all events
DefaultEventStyle.label: Default Event Style

EventPrimaryKeyField.help: Select the primary key or unique ID for the event Table.
EventPrimaryKeyField.label: Primary Key Field

EventTitleField.help: This field's value is what you'll see on the Calendar.
EventTitleField.label: Title Field

EventDescriptionField.help: This field's value will show up in the Tool tip whn hovering over an event.
EventDescriptionField.label: Tooltip Field

EventStartDateField.help: This field's value is the event's Start Date.
EventStartDateField.label: Start Date Field

EventStartTimeField.help: This field's value is the event's Start Time.
EventStartTimeField.label: Start Time Field

EventEndDateField.help: This field's value is the event's End Date.
EventEndDateField.label: End Date Field

EventEndTimeField.help: This field's value is the end time of the event.
EventEndTimeField.label: End Time Field

EventAllDayField.help: This field's value determines if the event shows up in top of the calendar.
EventAllDayField.label: All Day Field

EventEditableField.help: If This field's value  is 1, then the event will be editable on the calendar
EventEditableField.label: Editable Field

EventStyleField.help: This field's value will override the default Calendar style for the event.
EventStyleField.label: Event Style Field

EventFilterField.help: This is the field that will be searched.
EventFilterField.label: Search in this Field

EventFilterQueryField.help: The value in this field will be used to search the field below.
EventFilterQueryField.label: Search Criteria Field

StartOnDay.help: Should the calendar start on Sunday or Monday.
StartOnDay.label: Start On Day

StartingView.help: Choose the view the calendar will open to.
StartingView.label: Default View
